definitions.text: a particular geographical region of indefinite boundary (usually serving some special purpose or distinguished by its people or culture or geography)

examples: it was his area of specialization

definitions.text: a part of an animal that has a special function or is supplied by a given artery or nerve
a particular environment or walk of life
examples: it was a closed area of employment

definitions.text: a part of a structure having some specific characteristic or function
examples: the spacious cooking area provided plenty of room for servants

definitions.text: the extent of a 2-dimensional surface enclosed within a boundary
examples: it was about 500 square feet in area
